questions.description: The list of questions that make up this test.

initValue.description: The initial number of points that this question is worth.

maxScore.description: The maximum number of points that this question can be worth.

availDate.description: The date after which the test is available for students to view.

dueDate.description: The due date for the test (still visible afterwards, but no more points can be gained).

allowPractice.description: Whether to allow questions to be tried for practice, with no points earned or lost.

maxScore.description: The number of points that counts as complete, and so gives 100% on the test.

text.description: HTML text shown on the test overview page.
